headline: Robinhood, Susquehanna Strike Deal to Acquire LedgerX For Prediction Market Expansion
summary: Robinhood Markets and Susquehanna Group have agreed to buy 90% of regulated exchange LedgerX from Miami International Holdings, in a deal that pushes the US retail trading giant deeper into event-driven crypto markets as interest in prediction platforms accelerates.The partners plan to run LedgerX as an independent exchange through a ...

headline: Polymarket Is Cleared to Offer Prediction Markets as U.S. Regulator Remains Quiet on Sports Betting
summary: Polymarket can now offer event contracts to traders through brokerage firms, as the CFTC remains noncommittal on the topic of regulation.

headline: Robinhood's predictions market plans, Nutanix stock slides
summary: Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman tracks several of the day's top trending stock tickers, including Robinhood Markets' (HOOD) plans to launch a predictions market platform with Susquehanna, Nutanix (NTNX) cutting its 2026 revenue forecast, and Zscaler (ZS) shares falling despite its fiscal first quarter earnings estimates. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Stocks to Watch Wednesday: Dell, Workday, Deere, Robinhood
summary: ↗️ Dell (DELL): The computer and software maker raised full-year guidance and forecast AI server shipments would more than double. Shares rose about 4%. ↗️️ HP (HPQ): The computer and printer maker plans to cut up to 10% of its workforce as it invests further in artificial intelligence.

headline: Robinhood Stock Rallies on Prediction-Markets Push
summary: Robinhood Markets shares popped after the online brokerage unveiled plans for a futures and derivatives exchange to expand its array of prediction contracts.    The exchange, which is being launched with Susquehanna International, will acquire MIAXdx, a business that clears and executes derivatives trades.

content.title: Robinhood Stock Rallies on Prediction-Markets Push
content.summary: Robinhood Markets shares popped after the online brokerage unveiled plans for a futures and derivatives exchange to expand its array of prediction contracts.    The exchange, which is being launched with Susquehanna International, will acquire MIAXdx, a business that clears and executes derivatives trades.

headline: Deere outlook miss, Robinhood's new deal, Nvidia rebounds

headline: Why Is Robinhood (HOOD) Stock Soaring Today
summary: Shares of financial services company Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD) jumped 8.2% in the afternoon session after it announced a new joint venture with Susquehanna International Group to acquire a 90% stake in the regulated exchange MIAXdx, a move to significantly bolster its prediction markets business.

content.title: Why Is Robinhood (HOOD) Stock Soaring Today
content.summary: Shares of financial services company Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD) jumped 8.2% in the afternoon session after it announced a new joint venture with Susquehanna International Group to acquire a 90% stake in the regulated exchange MIAXdx, a move to significantly bolster its prediction markets business.

headline: Robinhood Leads S&P After This Announcement On Prediction Markets
summary: The brokerage is teaming up with market maker Susquehanna International Group on a joint venture that will manage the independent exchange.

headline: Robinhood Makes Prediction Market Push With Purchase of Former FTX Platform LedgerX
summary: Wall Street research firm Bernstein said the move — which Robinhood made in conjunction with market-making giant SIG — raises the stakes for competitors like Polymarket and Kalshi.

content.title: Robinhood Makes Prediction Market Push With Purchase of Former FTX Platform LedgerX
content.summary: Wall Street research firm Bernstein said the move — which Robinhood made in conjunction with market-making giant SIG — raises the stakes for competitors like Polymarket and Kalshi.
